Detailed Description

Common Overlay pipe related parameters.

struct Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig::globalAlpha

Global alpha value from 0 to 255. 0 corresponds to fully transparent and 255 to fully opaque. Transparency will take effect only when zorder > 0 for a pipeline

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig::pipeLine

All below configuration is applied to this pipeline. For valid values check Vps_DssDispcPipes.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig::preMultiplyAlpha

This will configures the piepline to process incoming data as premultiplied alpha or not.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig::zorder

Defining the priority of the layer compared to others when overlaying different pipelines, for valid values Vps_DssDispcZorder

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig::zorderEnable

Enable or disable the zorder for a pipeline.
